results.title: Metformin protects against insulin resistance induced by high uric acid in cardiomyocytes via AMPK signalling pathways in vitro and in vivo
results.text_hl: We investigated whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects against HUA-induced @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ in cardiomyocytes.

results.title: Amelioration of Hippocampal Insulin Resistance Reduces Tau Hyperphosphorylation and Cognitive Decline Induced by Isoflurane in Mice
results.text_hl: We further examined whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can alleviate hippocampal @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ and improve both tau hyperphosphorylation and pNR2B-Tyr1472 downregulation caused by long-term @CHEMICAL_Isoflurane @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007530 @@@isoflurane@@@ anesthesia.

results.title: SLC22A1 rs622342 Polymorphism Predicts Insulin Resistance Improvement in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Treated with Metformin: A Cross-Sectional Study
results.text_hl: ... @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is the most widely used oral antidiabetic agent and can reduce @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ (IR) effectively.

results.title: Insulin Resistance in Adolescents and Youth With Type 1 Diabetes: A Review of Problems and Solutions
results.text_hl: The mean improvement in @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IS@@@ ranged from 1.4% to 4.6% in participants on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as opposed to deterioration of -2% to -14.1% in the non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group.

results.title: Action Mechanisms of Metformin Combined with Exenatide and Metformin Only in the Treatment of PCOS in Obese Patients
results.text_hl: Some clinical studies comparing @GENE_GCG @GENE_24952 @@@GLP-1@@@ RA with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed that the former has advantages in improving body weight, HOMA-@<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@, menstrual frequency, and spontaneous pregnancy rate.

results.title: Metformin combined with spironolactone vs. metformin alone in polycystic ovary syndrome: a meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Moreover, when the treatment course was greater than 6 months, combination therapy reduced FBG and improved @<m>DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ more effectively than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone.
